column5: Come live a one of a kind stay with one of a kind art. Experience the artful joy of living in an art gallery museum fire station. This unique space is full of creativity and love that will rejuvenate your spirit. Chill-out on the art deco room or the front courtyard with glass sculptures, plants, flower and more. Sip on fresh moringa juice lemonade and enjoy the energy of the creative arts. Sleep in luxury and comfort and awake fresh and new. Each room is unique, artful, and a one of a kind.
